code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';var INITIAL_CART={cart:[]};export var addPrato=function addPrato(prato){return{'type':'addPrato','payload':prato};};function cartReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:INITIAL_CART;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'addPrato':var cart=state.cart;cart.push(action.payload);break;default:return state;}}export default combineReducers({cart:cartReducer});
